title: Which countries have never won Eurovision? - Quora

response.answer_text: The full list of non-winners (including countries which don’t exist anymore and those which seem unlikely to return) is: AlbaniaAndorraArmeniaAustraliaBelarusBosnia and HerzegovinaBulgariaCroatia (which was the “source” of the Yugoslavian band Riva, the only Yugoslavian winner)CyprusCzech RepublicGeorgiaHungaryIcelandLithuaniaMaltaMoldovaMontenegroMorocco(North) MacedoniaPolandRomaniaSan MarinoSerbia and MontenegroSlovakiaSloveniaThere are, of course, a great many countries which have never entered and therefore haven’t won, but I assume that’s not what is meant.

21 countries, including my home country Australia (yes, it is in the Eurovision ;-) but we have only participated 5 times and came 2nd in 2016. Source: 21 Countries That Have Still Never Won Eurovision
